instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the model performance to determine the most effective spectral feature selection method for estimating soil pH in lime concretion black soil and how far can this metric go?
Output: The metric chosen to evaluate the model performance in the past study was the coefficient of determination (R-2), root mean square error (RMSE), and residual prediction deviation (RPD). The RPD is a measure of the model's ability to differentiate between different pH levels, with higher values indicating better discrimination.
